title: Chapter 1369 - Taking Action
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1369 - Taking Action

The Temple Master had barged in, alone save for his sword, disrupting the Yun Family’s day of celebration and attacking Goldendawn Divine Mountain!

He fought alone, but it was as if his enemies weren’t even there. He broke their Immortal Dao sword formation, shattered their immortal sword, slew the Cloud Soaring Realm powerhouse Wei Changfu, and annihilated the Transcendents of the Yun Family!

In the end, Family Head Yun Changhong went so far as to kneel and pay for his crimes with his life, all to buy his clan a thread of hope!

When word got out, cultivators throughout the stars felt completely dumbstruck.

Just three days prior, the Temple Master created enormous waves atop the Violet Heavens Platform. Word of that battle was still circulating the stars.

Yet now, just three days later, the Temple Master stirred up yet another bloody storm, suppressing the ancient Yun Family!

This was unquestionably far too domineering. It completely overturned their imaginations. 

“Is the Temple Master going to get even with everyone so… dynamically?”

Countless people’s hearts shook with astonishment.

In the present-day Eastern Profound Star Domain, the Six Ancient Guardian Clans of the Dao were unquestionably the top modern cultivation factions around,...
